page: PH60306: Nuclear Techniques For Material Studies

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Particle Induced X-Ray Emission (Principles, Systems, Applications); X-Ray Fluorescence (Principles, Systems, Applications); Rutherford Backscattering Spectrometry (Principles, Systems, Applications); Ion Beam Channeling (Principles, Systems, Applications); Ion Implantation (Principles, Systems, Applications); Photoelectron and Auger Electron Spectroscopy (Principles, Systems, Applications); Positron Annihilation Technique (Principles, Systems, Applications); Moessbauer Spectroscopy (Principle, Systems, Applications); Perturbed Angular Correlation Technique (Principle, Systems, Applications); Neutron Activation Analysis (Principle, Systems, Applications)
page: PH60306: Nuclear Techniques For Material Studies
